title: The New Large Rod Item
body:
Is an AP Static Shiv... LOL WHAT?

Riot said they wanted to add a new item that built out of {{item:1058}} after removing DFG.

An AP Static Shiv has just hit PBE.

120AP
7% Movespeed
Static Shiv Style Passive: Collects charge from moving. At 100 charge releases electric burst that deals 100 + 15% AP to 4 targets. (seems OP as f).

Obviously will probably be nerfed since its the 1st model to hit PBE. But dangerous idea to give AP's a safe waveclear item I think.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/218-pbe-update.html#6

replies.body: It's got a name now "Luden's Echo" plus a pretty cool icon.

Yeah that's not coming through to live so i wouldn't worry too much.

"we've been spending some time exploring a few different options to add another "late-game mage item" into the game. we're now at the point where we want to share one of those directions with our pbe testers and see how the item is received with a wider audience."

Meaning;

"This was one of our concepts, we want to see what it does."

And honestly it's not going to do good things to the game.

dangerous to give....great wave clearing champions.....extra waveclear....
what?
99.9999% of mages clear waves easily....118 damage based off its own stats....120 AP will most likely give more than that to their spells...

Ok, giving assassins ranged clear. Im mainly thinking Akali, Le Blanc, Nidalee and Katarina. Champions who struggled to clear waves without putting themselves in a bit of danger. You give them the ability to clear a little faster at tower from range.

Seiging would be very hard.

ok....so lets just see...
akali, melee. E AOE clear. melee static proc....wouldnt be able to ranged AOE clear with it...
LB. W R instant wave clear. ranged AA. ranged static proc....good. also the item stats are good for her. will slightly increase her roaming potential by rushing this item. still has waveclear without it.
nid....split pushing beast....more wave clear = more split push power....but in no way is this a supplement to her wave clear...(if i used the right word...i mean she has wave clear with or without it...nothing changes)
kat....really? Q and W is plenty of wave clear....hell, Q is ranged wave clear....

none of these really struggle to clear waves....and 3 of them are in no danger from pushing waves....
its a great item...but in no way overpowered...maybe a good 2nd item once people start realizing that rushing a deathcap isnt that good on just about any AP champ.....

This is not near as strong as DFG in terms of single-target burst capabilities, which is something I think is good.
I do think that it wouldn't be as good for wave clear as people worry it is. People like Akali still won't have the AD and attack speed characters like ADCs have which let them get through the waves quickly. This just means they do a little bit of extra damage to the minions. It makes their wave clearing a bit better, but not super strong. If it becomes a huge problem they could just nerf the damage it does to minions or something, I guess.
Most APs already have good wave clear though, because a lot of them have AoE damage.

What I am interested in how targetting works with this though.
For example, let's say Soraka gets it for some reason for the sake of this example. She throws down her Starcall hitting like 10 minions. Where does the chain of lightning start?

I think that magickk shiv will probably be used a lot because it gives 120 AP which means you can have 3 120 AP items without wasting stats and the electric burst just makes it a little nicer because it gives you a little more AOE damage.
does the passive proc from aa's or spells ?
